notes_text: As with all drugs, cannabis-related offenses are punishable by a fine or imprisonment for up to 2 years. Freetown Christiania, a self-declared autonomous community in Copenhagen, is known for its cannabis trade.
notes: As with all drugs, cannabis-related offenses are punishable by a fine or imprisonment for up to 2 years. Freetown Christiania, a self-declared autonomous community in Copenhagen, is known for its cannabis trade.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Denmark}} As with all drugs, cannabis-related offenses are punishable by a fine or imprisonment for up to 2 years.<ref>{{citation |url = http://www.1stmarijuanagrowerspage.com/denmark-marijuana-cannabis-laws.html |title = Denmark marijuana laws â€“ cannabis growing and marijuana seeds |publisher = 1stmarijuanagrowerspage.com |access-date = 17 February 2011 |archive-date = 20 May 2019 |archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20190520155622/http://www.1stmarijuanagrowerspage.com/denmark-marijuana-cannabis-laws.html |url-status = live }}</ref> [[Freetown Christiania]], a self-declared autonomous community in [[Copenhagen]], is known for its cannabis trade.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Radicella |first1=Lucas |title=Copenhagen's largest cannabis market shut down |url=https://www.euronews.com/2018/05/22/copenhagen-s-largest-cannabis-market-shut-down |publisher=[[Euronews]] |access-date=17 October 2018 |date=22 May 2018 |archive-date=17 October 2018 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181017123732/https://www.euronews.com/2018/05/22/copenhagen-s-largest-cannabis-market-shut-down |url-status=live }}</ref>
